inclusion.criterion: Breast Ductal Carcinoma in-situ patients who diagnosed preoperative tissue biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A person who understands this study and agrees with willingness to participate
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ductal Carcinoma in-situ which diagnosed excisional biopsy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: When there is no lesion that can be discriminated from magnetic resonance imaging
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have complication (hematoma, abscess etc.) after preoperative biopsy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. She is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
